set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.label: t__Align left
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its left.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.label: t__Align right
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its right.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-center.label: t__Align center
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-center.description: t__Center the content of the current cell.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justify.label: t__Justify
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justify.description: t__Justify the content of the current cell.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.label: t__Align top
set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its top.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.label: t__Align bottom
set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its bottom.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-center.label: t__Align center
set-cell-vertical-alignment-center.description: t__Center the content of the current cell.
